pageTitle: Large structure fire on West Bergen Road | The Batavian
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {3613=UPDATE 2:05 p.m.: Pavilion is called to the scene in emergency mode. A thermal imaging camera will be used to check for heat in the garage., 3454=UPDATE 2:12 p.m.: EMTs are asked to check the well-being of a volunteer firefighter., 3709=UPDATE 1:57 p.m.: Pavilion is now requested to stand by in its own quarters., 3819=UPDATE 1:52 p.m.: Fire police are requested to shut down that portion of West Bergen Road., 3105=UPDATE 2:30 p.m.: The fire is out and they are breaking down their equipment and preparing to go back in service., 3350=UPDATE 2:16 p.m.: A deputy is requested to the scene, possibly to deal with bystanders. Earlier, command asked that they told to back away from the scene. When Bergen is through with its task, the crew can go back in service.}

textBeforeTable: » « August 2015 Calendar register to post comments Log in or Post new comment UPDATE 2:30 p.m.: The fire is out and they are breaking down their equipment and preparing to go back in service. UPDATE 2:16 p.m.: A deputy is requested to the scene, possibly to deal with bystanders. Earlier, command asked that they told to back away from the scene. When Bergen is through with its task, the crew can go back in service. UPDATE 2:12 p.m.: EMTs are asked to check the well-being of a volunteer firefighter. UPDATE 2:05 p.m.: Pavilion is called to the scene in emergency mode. A thermal imaging camera will be used
